com.nokia.mid.network
Interface SIMStateListener

public interface SIMStateListener

SIMStateListener is interface for listening to change notification of SIM state

Copyright (c) 2012 Nokia Mobile Phones

Since:
SDK3.0

Method Summary
 void SIMStateChanged(int simIndex, int state)
          change notification.
 

Method Detail

SIMStateChanged

void SIMStateChanged(int simIndex,
                     int state)
change notification.

Parameters:
simIndex: - the index of the SIM card on which the change happens. 0 for SIM 1; 1 for SIM 2
state: - the new state
